feature.label: MIRoN Eclipse Tools
feature.provider-name: University of Extremadura, University of Málaga, Blue Ocean Robotics
feature.description: MIRoN Plugins. "MIRoN: QoS Metrics-in-the-loop for better robot navigation" was an Integrated Technical Project (ITP) funded in the context of the EU H2020 RobMoSys project. MIRoN ​provides tools to endow robots with the ability of self-adapting its course of action according to the external and internal context at runtime.
feature.copyright: MIRoN is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 3 of the License, or any later version.
